item.title: Using unit tests to identify & avoid memory leaks in Swift
item.description: John Sundell demonstrates how we can use simple unit tests to identify and avoid memory leaks. John looks at three scenarios - using delegates, observers, and closures - and describes the problem that can arise with each.
